mean_cn: adj. 实际的，注重实效的
mean_en: dealing with the problems that exist in a specific situation in a reasonable and logical way instead of depending on ideas and theories
sentence: I don't need any fancy designs, I prefer my furniture to be more pragmatic.
sentence_trans: 我不需要花哨昂贵的设计，我更喜欢实用的家具。
word_etyma: pragm行为+atic...的→以行为最重要的→实用主义的
